div.p: Research is a group effort. You may want to delegate the task of uploading data to a particular member of your team or share the task amongst several individuals. You may want to share your data with a collaborator. You have control over who can access your studies.

To share a study with an individual, you will need to add them as an administrator. Administrators will have all the same rights as you — the study creator — including uploading data, downloading anonymized data, adding/removing administrators and editing all the information about the study.
Administrators will only be able to access the study once it has been registered and will need to register with the WWARN website.
You can add or remove administrators at any time by logging into your account, navigating to this study and clicking the Permissions tab.
